author: bago
msg: Refactored DNSServer implementation to fix cache issues and remove static usage:
now it properly cache MX lookups for CNAMEd domains (JAMES-672)
now we don't anymore manually use the cache/resolver, but we delegate to dnsjava (so the logging issue described in JAMES-673 is no more valid)
all the calls now use a "new Lookup" object and initialize it with the local cache, resolver, searchpath (fix for JAMES-674)
Removed much code that is already correctly handled by dnsjava 2.

author: dvholten
msg: remove some use of 'new String("xx")', 'new Boolean()', make some potentially parallel accessed variables volatile, strip trailing blanks

author: husted
msg: WW-1488 Update license headers for Struts 2 source.
